name: Lovebirds (Insane Scatterbrain)
description:
This is my entry for Brackeys Game Jam #2 (Theme: Love is blind). I didn't really have time for it, but I wanted to make something anyway.

It's more of a prototype than a polished game, but the art and gameplay mechanics are complete, so I'm pretty happy with it all things considered. :)

Goal:
Shoot ducks to regain your vision, but don't crash into them! Vision is lost over time and when crashing into ducks.

The game is over when all vision is lost.

Controls:

  • W: Flutter
  • A: Move Left
  • D: Move Right
  • Aim with mouse
  • Hold LMB to charge shot
  • Release LMB to shoot
